description.full: The Worms Collection features three best-selling Worms titles only previously available via Xbox LIVE Arcade for Xbox 360. Each game preserves all of the features, online functionality and Achievements from their download versions.  Worms - The original and classic 2D turn-based strategy game Worms  Worms 2: Armageddon - The feature-heavy and explosive Worms 2: Armageddon  Worms Ultimate Mayhem - The 3D cartoon craziness of Worms Ultimate Mayhem
